Reviews.Title: GREAT!
Reviews.Author: Anna Angel "mother of 2"
Reviews.Content: Nice phone as described.....quick shipping!! Connected to Sprint without an issue...just needed a SIM Card from Sprint....No problems at all :-)

Reviews.Title: iPhone
Reviews.Author: suz
Reviews.Content: Phone is great condition and working order as described.  No issues at all with purchase, very pleased overall with phone.

Reviews.Title: It's cool
Reviews.Author: kwuanna cooper
Reviews.Content: I wasn't an iPhone person but I got it anyway. To my surprise it's working well for me. It hasn't given me any issues

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Megan
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I wanted! Phone is in great condition.. Only problem was the SIM card was reported lost or stolen, so had to go to the sprint store and get a new one..

Reviews.Title: iphone 5c
Reviews.Author: angie2
Reviews.Content: I love this phone so much thank youYou really deserved that money and thanks for not setting me up.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TRANSACTION
Reviews.Author: genie
Reviews.Content: One of the best sellers I have dealt with. He went above and beyond for me and I appreciate it more then one can know.

Reviews.Title: really nice
Reviews.Author: Charly gilland
Reviews.Content: I'm an Android person, got an I-phone 4 and HATED it, decided I'd be an Android person forever, but then I thought I'd try this and I really like it.  With all the changes and updates it does most of the Android stuff, easier to clean up memory, the only thing it's missing is Swype.

Reviews.Title: I bought this for my niece and she loves it.
Reviews.Author: Mario S.
Reviews.Content: It is less expensive than the iphone 5s and I bought it with no contract to replace the iphone 4s that she had. She loves it and I think the phone looks nice and sleek.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Ashley Wilt
Reviews.Content: Love my new IPhone and it was a great price there was a small issue with the phone and the seller didn't have a replacement in my color.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: starry
Reviews.Content: very pleased with this purchase. I was skeptical buying a previously owned iphone but just couldnt see paying full price for a brand new one since we werent eligible for an upgrade yet. It was a gift for my daughter for christmas. It was in such good shape with the box and all, she had no idea it was previously owned.

Reviews.Title: Amazon does it again
Reviews.Author: Ryan D. Laufer
Reviews.Content: Got this for a great price and it was here fast! Love this phone so much over my old 4S!

Reviews.Title: Apple I-Phone
Reviews.Author: Jarrod Parker
Reviews.Content: The phone came quickly, but after a week the screen began to come loose from the phone.  A major repair right off the bat.

Reviews.Author: Juan Mendoza "juan mendoza"
Reviews.Content: i ordered a BLUE iphone 5c and got a green one like wow but its ok still a phone yeah

Reviews.Title: anaisa
Reviews.Author: ana flores
Reviews.Content: My son words, I wish it wasn't activated!! so Mom had to return it.. Very good condition and for the price of phone was reasonable He was very Disappointed...

Reviews.Title: Still phoneless
Reviews.Author: seeker
Reviews.Content: There was an issue with the ESN number of this phone. We were unable to use the phone.The seller was easy to work with to give me a quick refund. We still have no phone unfortunatly.

Reviews.Title: Regrettable Purchase
Reviews.Author: EP
Reviews.Content: I am not happy with this purchase at all.It was listed as "gently used," that's not true. There were scratches which didn't bother me, but the phone won't connect to the server properly (internet and apps do not work with data/internet). Both the speaker and mic malfunction, causing a lot of frustrating phone calls. I often have to hang up and call on a different phone to hear and be heard. The phone does not come with a SIM card, so until you get one you can't use it anyway. For theomen spent I wish I had just Purchased a brand new one that had a warranty.I'm very disappointed, because I trusted that Apple would provide a quality product (especially for a couple hundred dollar purchase). I will never purchase anything from Apple on Amazon again :(

Reviews.Title: Product I returned it , it was locked because it was reported stolen.
Reviews.Author: Mohammad Alshehree
Reviews.Content: Product I returned it , it was locked because it was reported stolen. Sprint the informed me the device will not work because it's looked because it's stolen item.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: Zoey D.
Reviews.Content: I switched to Sprint and got an HTC One, It is a good phone but before that I had an iPhone 4s, couldn't live without an iPhone i guess! very happy with my switch back to an iPhone!Shipping was fast!

Reviews.Title: NO IT DID NOT MEET MY EXPECTATIONS
Reviews.Author: Ashly M Innis
Reviews.Content: There was no SIM card and no Charger there for I could not use the phone, sprint would not buy it back so was out $280

Reviews.Title: Hoax
Reviews.Author: Edgar Emiro Rodriguez Cardenas
Reviews.Content: Because phone is locked in page it show as an unlocked phones then i can't used it at now. This was a hoax

Reviews.Title: Regrettable Purchase
Reviews.Author: EP
Reviews.Content: I am not happy with this purchase at all.It was listed as "gently used," that's not true. There were scratches which didn't bother me, but the phone won't connect to the server properly (internet and apps do not work with data/internet). Both the speaker and mic malfunction, causing a lot of frustrating phone calls. I often have to hang up and call on a different phone to hear and be heard. The phone does not come with a SIM card, so until you get one you can't use it anyway. For theomen spent I wish I had just Purchased a brand new one that had a warranty.I'm very disappointed, because I trusted that Apple would provide a quality product (especially for a couple hundred dollar purchase). I will never purchase anything from Apple on Amazon again :(

Reviews.Title: Product I returned it , it was locked because it was reported stolen.
Reviews.Author: Mohammad Alshehree
Reviews.Content: Product I returned it , it was locked because it was reported stolen. Sprint the informed me the device will not work because it's looked because it's stolen item.

Reviews.Title: This was not a good product
Reviews.Author: Kerrin Washington
Reviews.Content: I didn't like it because I went to go switch my service over and I couldn't because it was still in someone else name

Reviews.Title: YAY!
Reviews.Author: Bridget
Reviews.Content: When my phone broke and I wasn't eligible for an upgrade, I thought I was out of luck. Then I searched on Amazon and found this little thing, and I am so happy!!! Buying it refurbished it a lot better than used because it's basically a brand new phone. It looks and works perfect. It doesn't come with a SIM card, but I just went to a Sprint store and asked for one and they gave it to me for free!! I'm so happy with my purchase of this phone and I would definitely recommend buying from this company if you need a new phone but don't have an upgrade. Very fast shipping too!!

Reviews.Title: APPLE IPHONE5C
Reviews.Author: migdalia
Reviews.Content: We're having problems,  getting the sim card for this phone. My grandson is not happy.  We've contacted the Apple store and they don't have it.

Reviews.Title: seller delivers with an A+ service
Reviews.Author: Angel R. Tollinche
Reviews.Content: It met all my expectations from the seller the phone was a Xmas gift for my daughter and she is super happy with her phone

Reviews.Title: Amazing Phon
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Newsome
Reviews.Content: I highly reccomend you buy this. This phone has everything all in one. Truly wonderful phone! BUY NOW! A +
